name: Hooked in Hell
description:
Hooked in Hell

Follow our Twitter to stay updated with future games made by Lospec!

HOW TO PLAY

Manoeuvre your way through a variety of platforms and enemies in the hell of Greek mythos using your trusty grappling hook™ to escape overflowing magma.

The bar to the right will deplete with time, and it's game over if it empties. Refill the bar by killing enemies with your grappling hook™ (don't worry, they can't hurt you). 

Controls

Move and Aim - Arrow Keys
Jump - x
Shoot Hook - c
Use Button - Enter

CREDITS
